name: The Frozen Barrel
description:
Enrole Hammond, an old adventurer converted into an innkeeper, who opened a tavern named The Frozen Barrel in the small snowed village.
Everyday, many adventurers come here to drink et share their stories, troubles and wishes...
Help them find their destinies in a world full of unexpected events, you could change their lives!
However, never forget! Every action you make will have consequences...

Game Designers :

  • Hugo Monmousseau
  • Mathieu Melek

Game Artists :

  • Deirdre Aragnou
  • Tanguy Lecerf

Game Programmers:

  • Freddy Maupou
  • Antoine Viné
  • Jean-Michel Giverne
